Title: Prosopographica III
Abstract: © 2019 De Gruyter. All rights reserved.A sequel to a series of notes on high-ranking persons in Late Antique Egypt, continued from APF 55 (2009) 90-95. Included are Fl. Dionysius alias Apollonius, briefly curator civitatis of Oxyrhynchus in 325; Heraclammon and other officials mentioned in a speech of Shenute; from Hermopolis, Hermogenes, acting curator civitatis, and Callinicus, vir clarissimus; an Oxyrhynchite comes called Iustus; the Arsinoite scholasticus and pagarch Fl. Paulus; and a late but ghost Flavius.

26032781800.Name: Gonis N.
